properties.description:
The Cape Town club meets on Tuesday evenings from 19h00, but the previous venue has closed: Obz Café and "That Place" are possible new venues.

http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/cape-town-club/
properties.name: Cape Town Go Club
Durban Go club
properties.description:
(info date: May 2006)
Peter Charter is at work resuscitating the Durban Go club.
Meetings: Start 18h30 at the Steers on North Beach, on Tuesdays.
Contact: Peter Charter (cellphone: 082 900 1496) or Tony Clulow (home phone: 031 702 1749).

The Joburg club meets weekly, on Sundays (regularly) and on Tuesdays (occasionally):

Location:
Rosebank Mall – Fourno’s Bakery (Sunday mornings)
Rosebank Mall – Mugg and Bean (Tuesday evenings)

Time:
Sundays from 10:00 to 13:00 (approximately). Tuesdays from 19:00 to 21:00 (approximately).

http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/joburg-club/
properties.name: Johannesburg Go club

properties.description:
There is currently no club in Mossel Bay. However, anyone there interested in the game can contact Candice Barker. She would be happy to meet and play holiday-makers or business visitors in Mossel Bay, introduce the game to prospective new players, or meet other players from Mossel Bay and surrounds.
Meets: ad hoc
Contact: Candice Barker (phone: 0446905547)
properties.name: Mossel Bay go players

properties.description: See http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/other-clubs/ - There are no clubs in the Eastern Cape. However, anyone there interested in the game can contact William Mapham <william.mapham@gmail.com> or Patrick Lee <alobar@telkomsa.net>. They would be happy to meet and play holiday-makers or business visitors in Port Elizabeth, or introduce the game to prospective new players.
properties.name: Port Elizabeth players
Pretoria Go Club
properties.description:
The Pretoria Go Club meets on Wednesday evenings at the Outer Limits Comic and Games shop in Hatfield Square (near News Cafe).

For more information please contact Brett Wilson (072 099 9943) or John Leuner (076 226 9975).

See http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/pretoria-club/

Currently, the club regulars are Pablo Casado and Markus Jager, but new faces are welcome.
Meetings: Start 19h00 at House of Coffees in Clearwater Mall, on Wednesdays
Contact: Pablo Casado (e-mail: phmcasado !@! gmail [d-o-t] com)
properties.name: Roodepoort Go club
Soweto Go Club
properties.description: This club is probably not active, but for more details contact Sipho Mampe: 084 7888 177 or see http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/soweto-club/

properties.name: Stellenbosch Go Club
properties.description:
The club has been inactive since around early 2013. If you’d like to arrange a game/meeting, please join and email the mailing list (see below) or contact Gordon Wells. Recently (2015) some of us have been playing at The Guild campus board-gaming society.

See http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/stellenbosch-club/

properties.name: University of Johannesburg Go Society
properties.description:
Not sure whether this club is active. 

Go meetings in 2006 will be in the following venues:
Mondays: C-Les 305, 13:00-14:00
Wednesdays: D-Les 411, 13:00-14:00

See http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/uj-club/
